name: Kleptomaniac
description:
Enter in the Ludum Museum and try to steal as much masterpieces as you can.

Type 'E' to steal discretly when a dog is nearby !

Made during the Ludum Dare 41 with :
Charles Lamarche as Game Artist - Quentin Roussel as Game Designer

Clément Amendola as Sound and Level Designerand finally me as Game Programmer
